name: Drag & Drop Parkour
description:
Drag and drop your way to victory in this First-Person, Low-Poly, Plat-former game!

Get ready for some frustrating levels, challenges, & Puzzles!

Controls:

Hold down the Left mouse button and Drag to move Intractable objects
Use W, A, S, and D to move Forwards, Backwards, Left, and Right
Press and hold Shift to sprint
Press Space to Jump

GOALS:

Drag interactibl obects to make stairs, ladders, and platforms to reach the White Cube (Next Level)
Developed in Unity 5; Scripted in MonoDevelop
Early Access Game (Game Still in Development)

Game will receive MAJOR updates including, more levels, challenges, and a story mode!!
